channel.name: Weather Channel US
channel.title: Rocky Mountain Wreckers
channel.desc: When freezing fog ices over I-80, Brendan gets his first test on a rollover recovery; heavy snow causes chaos for Big Jon and Kory as they battle a difficult jackknife; a moving van blasts off the highway in a snowstorm, pushing the Stauffer's team to perform a long pull up a steep incline.
